transcript: did not answer that voice and went on dreaming of his triumphs. The dispositions for the next battle are planned by him alone. Nominally he is only an adjutant on Kutiizov's staff, but he does everything alone. The next battle is won by him alone. Kutuzov is removed and he is appointed . . . "Well and then?" asked the other voice. "If before that you are not ten times wounded, killed, or betrayed, well . . . what then? . . ."
